website_summaries.verdict: This drone has an accurate Follow Me function and easy-to-learn flight dynamics.
pros: Comes with a number of advanced automated features such as Follow Me, route following, and return-to-home capabilities
Folds up to fit in bags and backpacks
cons: Fly-by-phone capabilities can be slow, delayed, or limited with a poor connection

customer_reviews.title: I love the Mavic Air drone and the bundle it went with.
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner in flying drones, and this was actually my first one. It is extremely easy to set up and more importantly it is easy to fly it. Of course the multiple youtube reviews helped but the learning curve is very fast. The (4K) video surprised me, it is beautiful. I am amazed at the stability of the drone in the air, even when there is a moderate wind. This translates in the video quality. The drone is well built and seems very sturdy. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan1

customer_reviews.title: Fun Drone the follow me mode needs work
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of things to love about the Mavic Air and there are some quirks that you just have to figure out. I found that the drone has issues with connection to the remote when it doesn’t have an SD card installed or if the onboard 8Gb of memory is not frequently cleared. Follow me mode is somewhat flakey and I’ll have to work with it some more to find the optimal way to use it. Overall it is a fun drone with an excellent camera.
customer_reviews.author: D7

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate
customer_reviews.text: if you’re thinking of ordering this, do it. this little thing is so damn fun, it fits in a backpack and it’s so tiny. it’s super easy to fly, i had it out of beginner mode within 5 minutes mind you this is my first ever drone. it handles super good and the camera is really stable and clear. only issue i have is that the battery doesn’t last as long as i would like to be flying lol. other than that i definitely recommend this and get it out of the way and order the extra batteries ahead of time or you’re gonna be like me and regret it
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Drone great, bag horrrrrriibbbbblleeee
customer_reviews.text: The drone by all means is the drone to own if u are a beginner and onwards anyways. No need for a review for that. Lets talk about the crappy bag Beach Camera put in there. Ive purchased a few bundles from them including the sony without complaint a7II. I opened the packages and attempted to unzip the bag only to have the zip come apart immediately. I'd rather not have a bag added than you add one and its crap. The foam to hold the drone is the only good thing about this bag. Thats y i gave a 3

customer_reviews.title: Fun to Fly
customer_reviews.text: Its a great in between option for the spark and the mavic 2 pro. I own all three and each one had slightly different flight characteristics. This one is is my favorite. uber portable and snappy in response.

customer_reviews.text: The video attached was my first time flying any drone. Super easy to use. Only downside is my range is no where near the 2 miles it claims.

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5...
customer_reviews.text: The Mavic Air is an excellent drone for beginners and professionals alike. The only reason why I gave 4 stars not 5 is because I was supposed to get extra props but they weren't included. Check everything when buying from this seller.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing drone
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my brother as a Christmas gift. He loved it so much, he doesn’t like that at night is almost imposible to fly, even tho we got lights on each side. He loves photography, he has a professional camera and a go pro and still thinks he needed this. So I guess it’s worth it. He said it is. First time he flew the drone inside the house smh and didn’t activate an option that it has like to avoid walls and big objects. So REMEMBER to activate it. After that, he flew it outside. It went great!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Camila Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: Portability
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best things that I've bought myself in years. Great videos, great pictures, super easy and fun to fly around. Great for beginners and pro's. Although you get about 18 minutes of flight time (I wish it was more), it's generally enough time to get those perfect shots. This doesn't feel cheap or like a toy at all. It's a durable little unit that should give years of use. Almost perfect.
